entry.title: NIH MIRA award
entry.content: Our group has been awarded a $2.1M NIH MIRA grant to support ongoing work in enzymology and protein design. We are currently seeking highly motivated postdoctoral fellows and graduate students to join our research team.
entry.summary: Our group has been awarded a $2.1M NIH MIRA grant to support ongoing work in enzymology and protein design. We are currently seeking highly motivated postdoctoral fellows and graduate students to join our research team.

entry.title: Two UF ROSF grant for enzyme engineering

link.title: Two UF ROSF grant for enzyme engineering

entry.content: We were awarded two UF ROSF grants to advance our efforts in enzyme engineering. These projects are collaborative initiatives: one with Dr. Gentry and Dr. Vander Kooi from the College of Medicine, focused on engineering therapeutic enzymes, and another with Dr. Voiniciuc from IFAS, aimed at engineering plant enzymes.
entry.summary: We were awarded two UF ROSF grants to advance our efforts in enzyme engineering. These projects are collaborative initiatives: one with Dr. Gentry and Dr. Vander Kooi from the College of Medicine, focused on engineering therapeutic enzymes, and another with Dr. Voiniciuc from IFAS, aimed at engineering plant enzymes.

entry.title: JACS paper using sequence to predict individual steps in enzymatic reaction

link.title: JACS paper using sequence to predict individual steps in enzymatic reaction

entry.content: We showed evolutionary sequence data can predict individual steps in enzymatic reaction. This is crucial for us to understand how nature evolves efficient enzymes and could inform us strategies for rational enzyme design. Congrats to Dr. Wenqiang Cui and all authors!
entry.summary: We showed evolutionary sequence data can predict individual steps in enzymatic reaction. This is crucial for us to understand how nature evolves efficient enzymes and could inform us strategies for rational enzyme design. Congrats to Dr. Wenqiang Cui and all authors!

entry.title: DARPA grant
entry.content: Our got a DARPA AI grant with Dr. Pan’s lab on enzyme design!
entry.summary: Our got a DARPA AI grant with Dr. Pan’s lab on enzyme design!

entry.title: Yunlu joins the team as a graduate student

link.title: Yunlu joins the team as a graduate student

entry.content: Yunlu Liu from Jilin University joined us as a graduate student!
entry.summary: Yunlu Liu from Jilin University joined us as a graduate student!

entry.title: Jon rotation
entry.content: Jon Golan, a Phd student in the Genetics and Genomics program, started his rotation in our lab!
entry.summary: Jon Golan, a Phd student in the Genetics and Genomics program, started his rotation in our lab!

entry.title: First graduate student
entry.content: Mengting Li from Northeastern University joined us as the first graduate student. She is the wet-lab expert in our lab!
entry.summary: Mengting Li from Northeastern University joined us as the first graduate student. She is the wet-lab expert in our lab!

entry.title: New postdoc
entry.content: Dr. Wenqiang Xu joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Peking University.
entry.summary: Dr. Wenqiang Xu joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Peking University.

entry.title: Awards for two undergraduate students
entry.content: Two undergraduate students (Leif and Audrey) co-supervised by Dr. Jing Pan’s lab were accepted to University Scholar Program. Congrats!
entry.summary: Two undergraduate students (Leif and Audrey) co-supervised by Dr. Jing Pan’s lab were accepted to University Scholar Program. Congrats!

entry.title: First postdoc
entry.content: Dr. Wenqiang Cui joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Chinese Academy of Sciences (Shenzhen).
entry.summary: Dr. Wenqiang Cui joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Chinese Academy of Sciences (Shenzhen).
